rooms.description: Spacious entrance with decorative elements and sustainable materials in compliance with local building norms.
Eco-friendly living space with natural lighting, large windows, energy-efficient LED lights, integrated ventilation system. Features Vastu recommendations such as east-facing openings.
Open dining area adjacent to living room with sustainable furniture options and energy-efficient design. East-west oriented windows for natural light, following Vastu guidelines.
Fully equipped eco-friendly kitchen designed with low-energy appliances and a layout that supports efficient workflow. Incorporates natural ventilation and light as per Vastu principles.
Dedicated servant's quarters with functional layout and energy-efficient appliances. Designed to provide privacy while adhering to Vastu guidelines for service areas.
Utility storage area designed with eco-friendly materials and energy-saving lighting. Optimized placement for functionality as per local norms.

openings.description: Main entrance door with secure, durable materials and energy-efficient design. Placed in the south-east corner as per Vastu recommendations for a positive flow.
Secondary exit providing emergency egress, designed to be low-energy and secure.
Large windows on the living room and dining area for natural light and ventilation. East-facing openings as per Vastu guidelines.
